reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures but a bit too fast-paced. Would recommend attending office hours.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Tanaka explains everything clearly. Great professor!

reviews.subject: Modern European History
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but the lectures can be dry. Lots of reading required.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult material and not much support. Exams are tough and grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Cognitive Science
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures with lots of real-world applications. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course with a lot of group discussions. Prof. Smith is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Content is dense and difficult, but Dr. Nguyen is very patient and helpful.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and thought-provoking topics. Prof. Chen is great at facilitating discussion.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: A passionate professor who makes literature come alive. Loved this class!

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: The lectures are quite boring and the exams are difficult. Not my favorite course.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Content is challenging but Dr. Williams is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Spanish Language and Culture
reviews.review: Very interactive and fun course. Prof. Garcia is enthusiastic and supportive.

reviews.subject: Statistics for Social Sciences
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Dr. Lee makes statistics interesting and relevant.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting course with lots of hands-on projects. Prof. Davis is very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: One of the best courses I've taken! Dr. Ivanov is a leading expert in the field.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Great course for aspiring writers. Prof. Hernandez provides lots of constructive feedback.

reviews.subject: American Politics
reviews.review: The lectures are informative but can be a bit dry. Dr. Miller knows his stuff though.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Ethics
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and engaging lectures. Prof. Kim is a great teacher.

reviews.subject: Classical Mythology
reviews.review: Amazing course! Dr. O'Connor makes mythology come alive with his storytelling.

reviews.subject: Public Speaking
reviews.review: A very practical course with lots of opportunities to practice. Prof. Thompson is encouraging and supportive.
